name: Technofrog
description:
"It's always a good sign, if the game starts with an exception" - Nobody 2020

This game is a total rushjob ;) Im proud of the graphics not the code.

The Plot: You play a frog. He has an implant, that gives him control over his own instincts. Problem: He can only choose one instinct at a time.

Controls: WAD or arrow Keys to move, space to control your instincts or select
